Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review last week's notes to prepare for brainstorming session.
Participate in the brainstorming session with the team to define key user interaction features. Take notes on all discussed ideas.
Discuss the outcomes of the brainstorming session with @UIUX Designer for next steps regarding wireframes.
Start drafting initial wireframes for the new UI elements based on the feedback from the brainstorming session.
Collaborate with @3D Modeler/Animator to ensure that the wireframes align with the game's aesthetic.
End of the day, wrap up any remaining tasks, and organize notes for the next day.
